title: To provide for the establishment of a pilot program to encourage the employment of veterans in energy-related positions.
content: Energy Jobs for Veterans Act - Directs the Secretary of Labor to establish a five-year pilot program to award competitive grants to three states to establish and administer a program of grants to energy industry employers and labor management organizations that provide training, apprenticeships, and certification classes to veterans employed by an energy employer. Requires annual reports from the Secretary to Congress for the duration of the pilot program. Authorizes appropriations.
